changeSet.author: cabalen
changeSet.comment: Migrate config hardcoded remote party into ETX_WEB_PARTY_ICA
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO ETX_WEB_PARTY_ICA (PCA_ID, PAR_ID, PCA_NODE_NAME, PCA_DISPLAY_NAME, PCA_CREATED_BY, PCA_LOADED_ON, PCA_INTEGRITY, PCA_CONFIDENTIALITY, PCA_CERTIFICATE, PCA_CREATED_ON, PCA_UPDATED_ON, PCA_UPDATED_BY, PCA_STATE) SELECT ETX_WEB_PARTYICASEQ.nextval, p.PAR_ID, bc.BCG_PROPERTY_VALUE, bc.BCG_PROPERTY_VALUE, 0, SYSDATE, null, null, null, SYSDATE, null, null, 1 FROM ETX_WEB_PARTY p JOIN ETX_WEB_BUSINESS_CONFIG bc ON p.BUS_ID = bc.BUS_ID WHERE bc.BCG_PROPERTY_NAME = 'etx.business.receiver.node.party.name';

INSERT INTO ETX_WEB_PARTY_ICA (PCA_ID, PAR_ID, PCA_NODE_NAME, PCA_DISPLAY_NAME, PCA_CREATED_BY, PCA_LOADED_ON, PCA_INTEGRITY, PCA_CONFIDENTIALITY, PCA_CERTIFICATE, PCA_CREATED_ON, PCA_UPDATED_ON, PCA_UPDATED_BY, PCA_STATE) SELECT ETX_WEB_PARTYICASEQ.nextval, p.PAR_ID, bc.BCG_PROPERTY_VALUE, bc.BCG_PROPERTY_VALUE, 0, SYSDATE(), null, null, null, SYSDATE(), null, null, 1 FROM ETX_WEB_PARTY p JOIN ETX_WEB_BUSINESS_CONFIG bc ON p.BUS_ID = bc.BUS_ID WHERE bc.BCG_PROPERTY_NAME = 'etx.business.receiver.node.party.name';

changeSet.author: lambept
changeSet.comment: Add etx.business.folder.structure.enabled property to ETX_WEB_BUSINESS_CONFIG , true for edma business
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO ETX_WEB_BUSINESS_CONFIG (BCG_ID, BUS_ID, BCG_PROPERTY_NAME, BCG_PROPERTY_VALUE) SELECT ETX_WEB_BCGSEQ.nextval, BUS_ID,'etx.business.folder.structure.enabled','true' FROM ETX_WEB_BUSINESS_CONFIG WHERE BCG_PROPERTY_NAME = 'etx.business.custom.view.name' and BCG_PROPERTY_VALUE = 'edma'; INSERT INTO ETX_WEB_BUSINESS_CONFIG (BCG_ID, BUS_ID, BCG_PROPERTY_NAME, BCG_PROPERTY_VALUE) SELECT ETX_WEB_BCGSEQ.nextval, BUS_ID,'etx.business.folder.structure.enabled','false' FROM ETX_WEB_BUSINESS_CONFIG WHERE BCG_PROPERTY_NAME = 'etx.business.custom.view.name' and BCG_PROPERTY_VALUE != 'edma';

INSERT INTO ETX_WEB_BUSINESS_CONFIG (BUS_ID, BCG_PROPERTY_NAME, BCG_PROPERTY_VALUE) SELECT BUS_ID,'etx.business.folder.structure.enabled','true' FROM ETX_WEB_BUSINESS_CONFIG WHERE BCG_PROPERTY_NAME = 'etx.business.custom.view.name' and BCG_PROPERTY_VALUE = 'edma'; INSERT INTO ETX_WEB_BUSINESS_CONFIG (BCG_ID, BUS_ID, BCG_PROPERTY_NAME, BCG_PROPERTY_VALUE) SELECT BUS_ID,'etx.business.folder.structure.enabled','false' FROM ETX_WEB_BUSINESS_CONFIG WHERE BCG_PROPERTY_NAME = 'etx.business.custom.view.name' and BCG_PROPERTY_VALUE != 'edma';

changeSet.author: brighab
changeSet.sql: CALL ADD_LABEL_TRANSLATION('label.openAsNew', 'Open as new', 1, 1, 1, 1);

changeSet.author: brighab
changeSet.sql:
CALL ADD_LABEL_TRANSLATION('edma.splash.screen', '

Welcome to eTrustEx!

eTrustEx (Trusted Document Exchange) ensures secure transmission of documents between DG Competition and external stakeholders. It serves as the only communication channel to send documents to DG Competition whose total size is below 4GB. eTrustEx supports message encryption, message integrity through the use of checksum algorithms, authentication via EU Login and traceability. For more information see eTrustEx User Manual.


Your submission will be valid when it has reached DG Competition, that is when the sending has been completed successfully. This time will be marked in the sending receipt under "submission completed on".


The limits currently envisaged for document transmission via eTrustEx are the following:

  • Maximum size of transmission: 4GB;
  • Maximum size of each file uploaded in the same transmission: 100MB;
  • Maximum number of files uploaded in the same transmission: 1500;
  • ZIP files allowed: YES.

For Merger cases you can use eTrustEx to submit to the Commission, for example:

  • Draft Form CO
  • Responses to Requests For Information
  • Responses to requests for internal documents, if smaller than 4 GB
  • Response to a Statement of Objections
  • Submission of draft remedies
  • Any other submission to the Commission

For Antitrust cases you can use eTrustEx to submit to the Commission, for example:

  • Complaints
  • Comments on complaints
  • Responses to Requests For Information
  • Response to a Statement of Objections, a Preliminary Assessment or comments on the Article 7(1) letter
  • Any other submission to the Commission

For submissions larger than 4GB, please use a physical external carrier only (DVD, USB, external hard drive).

For technical support, please contact COMP-ETRUSTEX@ec.europa.eu.

 

' , 1, 1, 1, 1)

changeSet.author: fuscoem
changeSet.sql: CALL ADD_LABEL_TRANSLATION('receipt.sentOn', 'Sent on', 1, 1, 1, 1); CALL ADD_LABEL_TRANSLATION('receipt.deliveredOn', 'Submission completed on', 1, 1, 1, 1);

changeSet.author: brighab
changeSet.sql:
CALL ADD_LABEL_TRANSLATION('edma.splash.screen', '

Welcome to eTrustEx!

eTrustEx (Trusted Document Exchange) ensures secure transmission of documents between DG Competition and external stakeholders. It serves as a secure communication channel to send documents to DG Competition whose total size is below 4GB. eTrustEx supports message encryption, message integrity through the use of checksum algorithms, authentication via EU Login and traceability. For more information see eTrustEx User Manual.


Your submission will be valid when it has reached DG Competition, that is when the sending has been completed successfully. This time will be marked in the sending receipt under "submission completed on".


The limits currently envisaged for document transmission via eTrustEx are the following:


  • Maximum size of transmission: 4GB;
  • Maximum size of each file uploaded in the same transmission: 100MB;
  • Maximum number of files uploaded in the same transmission: 1500;

For Merger cases you can use eTrustEx to submit to the Commission, for example:

  • Draft Form CO
  • Responses to Requests For Information
  • Responses to requests for internal documents, if smaller than 4 GB
  • Response to a Statement of Objections
  • Submission of draft remedies
  • Any other submission to the Commission

For Antitrust cases you can use eTrustEx to submit to the Commission, for example:

  • Complaints
  • Comments on complaints
  • Responses to Requests For Information
  • Response to a Statement of Objections, a Preliminary Assessment or comments on the Article 7(1) letter
  • Any other submission to the Commission

For submissions larger than 4GB, please use a physical external carrier only (DVD, USB, external hard drive).

For technical support, please contact COMP-ETRUSTEX@ec.europa.eu.

 

' , 1, 1, 1, 1)

It serves as a secure communication channel to send documents to DG Competition whose total size is below 4GB. eTrustEx supports message encryption, message integrity through the use of checksum algorithms, authentication via EU Login and traceability. Your submission will be valid when it has reached DG Competition, that is when the sending has been completed successfully. This time will be marked in the sending receipt under "submission completed on".


The limits currently envisaged for document transmission via eTrustEx are the following:


  • Maximum size of transmission: 4GB;
  • Maximum size of each file uploaded in the same transmission: 100MB;
  • Maximum number of files uploaded in the same transmission: 1500;

For Merger cases you can use eTrustEx to submit to the Commission, for example:

  • Draft Form CO
  • Responses to Requests For Information
  • Responses to requests for internal documents, if smaller than 4 GB
  • Response to a Statement of Objections
  • Submission of draft remedies
  • Any other submission to the Commission

For Antitrust cases you can use eTrustEx to submit to the Commission, for example:

  • Complaints
  • Comments on complaints
  • Responses to Requests For Information
  • Response to a Statement of Objections, a Preliminary Assessment or comments on the Article 7(1) letter
  • Any other submission to the Commission

For submissions larger than 4GB, please use a physical external carrier only (DVD, USB, external hard drive).

For technical support, please contact COMP-ETRUSTEX@ec.europa.eu.

 

' , 1, 1, 1, 1)

changeSet.author: brighab
changeSet.sql:
INSERT INTO ETX_WEB_BUSINESS_CONFIG (BCG_ID, BUS_ID, BCG_PROPERTY_NAME, BCG_PROPERTY_VALUE) VALUES ((SELECT MAX(BCG_ID) + 1 FROM ETX_WEB_BUSINESS_CONFIG), 1, 'etx.business.edma.splash.screen', '

Welcome to eTrustEx!

eTrustEx (Trusted Document Exchange) ensures secure transmission of documents between DG Competition and external stakeholders. It serves as a secure communication channel to send documents to DG Competition whose total size is below 4GB. eTrustEx supports message encryption, message integrity through the use of checksum algorithms, authentication via EU Login and traceability. For more information see eTrustEx User Manual.


Your submission will be valid when it has reached DG Competition, that is when the sending has been completed successfully. This time will be marked in the sending receipt under "submission completed on".


The limits currently envisaged for document transmission via eTrustEx are the following:


  • Maximum size of transmission: 4GB;
  • Maximum size of each file uploaded in the same transmission: 100MB;
  • Maximum number of files uploaded in the same transmission: 1500;

For Merger cases you can use eTrustEx to submit to the Commission, for example:

  • Draft Form CO
  • Responses to Requests For Information
  • Responses to requests for internal documents, if smaller than 4 GB
  • Response to a Statement of Objections
  • Submission of draft remedies
  • Any other submission to the Commission

For Antitrust cases you can use eTrustEx to submit to the Commission, for example:

  • Complaints
  • Comments on complaints
  • Responses to Requests For Information
  • Response to a Statement of Objections, a Preliminary Assessment or comments on the Article 7(1) letter
  • Any other submission to the Commission

For submissions larger than 4GB, please use a physical external carrier only (DVD, USB, external hard drive).

For technical support, please contact COMP-ETRUSTEX@ec.europa.eu.

 

' );

It serves as a secure communication channel to send documents to DG Competition whose total size is below 4GB. eTrustEx supports message encryption, message integrity through the use of checksum algorithms, authentication via EU Login and traceability. For more information see eTrustEx User Manual.


Your submission will be valid when it has reached DG Competition, that is when the sending has been completed successfully. This time will be marked in the sending receipt under "submission completed on".


The limits currently envisaged for document transmission via eTrustEx are the following:


  • Maximum size of transmission: 4GB;
  • Maximum size of each file uploaded in the same transmission: 100MB;
  • Maximum number of files uploaded in the same transmission: 1500;

For Merger cases you can use eTrustEx to submit to the Commission, for example:

  • Draft Form CO
  • Responses to Requests For Information
  • Responses to requests for internal documents, if smaller than 4 GB
  • Response to a Statement of Objections
  • Submission of draft remedies

For Antitrust cases you can use eTrustEx to submit to the Commission, for example:

  • Any other submission to the Commission

For submissions larger than 4GB, please use a physical external carrier only (DVD, USB, external hard drive).

For technical support, please contact COMP-ETRUSTEX@ec.europa.eu.

 

' );
